title: GBP/USD Targeting 1.2200: Elliott Wave Analysis
text:
GBP/USD Targeting 1.2200: Elliott Wave Analysis

Gregor HorvatForex 1 hour ago (Oct 04, 2019 12:11PM ET) By

www.investing.com/analysis/gbpusd-targeting-12200-elliott-wave-analysis-200470671 GBP/USD Targeting 1.2200: Elliott Wave Analysis By By Gregor Horvat | 1 hour ago (Oct 04, 2019 12:11PM ET)

Follow Hello fellow traders, has a pretty clear intraday structure. We can see that after the three-wave a-b-c corrective rally from the 1.220 region, price dropped and can now be headed below the 1.2200 region within a new five-wave cycle. Early signs of more weakness on cable can be a completed a-b-c structure, and a breach below the lower corrective channel line. GBP/USD: Intraday GBPUSD, 1h

GBP/USD Targeting 1.2200: Elliott Wave Analysis
